question: How does the variant NRAS Q61K affect response to Everolimus in Neuroblastoma?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'NRAS Q61K'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Everolimus')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Everolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Everolimus')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neuroblastoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What is the effect of PIK3CA Amplification on Ibuprofen in Carcinoma Of The Head And Neck?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ibuprofen')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ibuprofen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ibuprofen')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.disease_name: Head And Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'MAP2K2 H123Q'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trametinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What is the effect of RET V804M on Selpercatinib in Medullary Thyroid Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'RET V804M'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selpercatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selpercatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selpercatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'medullary' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'thyroid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'NF2 Loss'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'thyroid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gland' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('CDK4/6 Inhibition')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA H1047R'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pictilisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pictilisib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pictilisib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'her2-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'positive' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Multikinase Inhibitor AEE788')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Multikinase Inhibitor AEE788'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Multikinase Inhibitor AEE788')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PTEN Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Enzalutamide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Enzalutamide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Enzalutamide')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'TP53 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Chemotherapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Chemotherapy'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Chemotherapy')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: How does the variant SMARCB1 Deletion affect response to Tazemetostat in Epithelioid Sarcoma?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'SMARCB1 Deletion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Tazemetostat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tazemetostat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tazemetostat')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'epithelioid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Alisertib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alisertib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alisertib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophagus' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: How does FGFR1 Amplification influence response to Rogaratinib for Breast Cancer?

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRCA1 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Rucaparib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Rucaparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Rucaparib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nintedanib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nintedanib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nintedanib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FGFR3 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'urinary' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'bladder'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FLT3 D835Y'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('KW2449')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('KW2449'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('KW2449')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sorafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sorafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sorafenib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gemcitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ductal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF V600E'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dabrafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dabrafenib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
